label: Oku, Yutaro, Tohru Naruse & Hironobu Fukami.  2017. Morpho-molecular evidence for polymorphism in the mushroom coral Cycloseris hexagonalis (Scleractinia: Fungiidae), with a new phylogenetic position and the establishment of a new genus for the species. Zoological Science 34(3): 242–251.
